summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of a portion of unplatted property in Section 20, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M. and the east 80 feet of Lots 1 to 8 inclusive, Block 2, Sunnyvale Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-214 and 17-160, respectively.
